DOC.brief_summary: To determine whether glucobrassicin-rich Brussels sprout favorably modify metabolism polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbon deuterated phenanthrene ( [ D10 ] phe ) current former smoker
DOC.brief_title: Glucobrassicin-Brussel Sprout Effect D10 Phe Metabolism
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects give 1 microgram [ D10 ] phe , urine collect 6 h afterwards quantify baseline level [ D10 ] phenanthrene tetraol ( [ D10 ] pheT ) [ D10 ] phenanthrols ( [ D10 ] HOP ) . Within 3 day baseline measurement , subject consume 200 micromoles glucobrassicin form raw Brussels sprout ( ~150 gram ) study center daily 7 consecutive day . Urine collect 24 h vegetable consumption day 3 ± 1 6 feed intervention 3,3'-diindolylmethane ( DIM ) quantification . On day 7 feeding intervention , second dose 1 microgram [ D10 ] phe administer study center vegetable consumption , follow another 6 h urine collection .
DOC.criteria: Adult ≥ 18 year old Current former smoker selfreport Willing abstain cruciferous vegetable consumption study vegetable study period Able understand experimental nature study provide inform consent Negative urine pregnancy test woman childbearing potential within 7 day baseline [ D10 ] phe dose Chronic proton pump inhibitor , H2blocker ( i.e. , ranitidine , famotidine ) , and/or calcium carbonate use History gastric bypass surgery , gastric banding , bowel resection , malabsorption syndrome celiac sprue pancreatic insufficiency , condition may affect gastric absorption Current use tobacco product cigarette ( i.e . snuff , snuz , smokeless tobacco , cigar , pipe ) use product within 3 month study registration Major chronic medical disease , include heart disease , poorly control diabetes , etc. , adjudicate principal investigator Women pregnant , intend become pregnant within 3 month study period , breastfeed Current recent ( within 12 month ) problem drug use alcohol dependence selfreport Antibiotic use within 2 month study enrollment study selfreport Alcohol dependence , abuse , history dependence/abuse selfreport Vegetarians History respiratory tract cancer Use metronidazole antabuse study Taking ibuprofen , naproxen , NSAIDs , steroid ( except inhale steroid ) within 14 day study registration Allergy Brussels sprout
